'''
Created on Jan 18, 2013

@author: orhan
'''
t = int(raw_input())
numbers = [0] * 100

for i in range(t):
    n = int(raw_input())
    line = raw_input().split()
    result = 0
    for j in range(n):
        result += int(line[j]) // (j+1)
    
    if result % 2 == 0:
        print 'BOB'
    else:
        print 'ALICE'
